name: Sleepy Hallow Slam
description:
The headless Horseman has awoken to find himself horseless. Now he seeks revenge on the town of sleepy hallow! Press space to launch and space to boost (If you have candles, that is).  Buy upgrades and launch ever further! MAde for Mini-Jam 89 in 11 hours by a team of 3.

  • Art direction by Alek
  • Music Direction by Mallesh
  • Programming by Jacob
